casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Gabriel A. FERRARI 277P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 Gabriel Adrian Ferrari, for Gabriel A. Ferrari. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Todd Williams, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of August 2018 by Defendant for Certiorari:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
